text: Empress Catherine sends her regards.
As you have proven your competence,
she has offered you a position:
'Chief Inspector of the Bolsherietsk Rebellion'.
This Hanbengoro was merely a puppet,
a cardboard cutout of the real deal.
The perpetrator is still at large
and it's up to you to find him.
Baron Benyovsky was last seen on Madagascar,
building a colony of his own.
Ivan Ryumin survived the expedition
and chose to return to Siberia
and live in the town of Tobolsk.
Gerasim Izmailov,
relieved of his obsession,
returned to his senses
and carved out a career as an explorer.
Ippolit Stepanov,
upon being released from a prison in Macau,
vanished off the face of the earth.
Captain Cook's expedition
ended the following year
with the commander's death in Hawai`i.
His Russian sailor returned to the Homeland
to lead the Bolsherietsk Rebellion investigation,
But that's a story for another time.
